C. 2, 39</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ad ejus spolia detrahenda,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,022:24:54" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Sest. 24, 54</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">indutus spoliis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:10:775" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 10, 775</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">victores praedā Rutuli spoliisque potiti,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 9, 450</bibl></cit>; <cit><quote lang="la">4, 93: virtutis honor spoliis quaeratur in istis,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:13:153" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 13, 153</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">insignis spoliis Marcellus opimis Ingreditur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:6:855" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 6, 855</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">spolia jacentis hostium exercitus peditibus concessit,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:44:45" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 44, 45</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Q. Fabius spolia ducis Gallorum legens,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:5:36" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 5, 36</bibl></cit>; so, <cit><quote lang="la">legere,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:5:39" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 5, 39</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:8:7" default="NO" valid="yes">8, 7</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:27:2 al" default="NO" valid="yes">27, 2 al.</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">spolia et praedas ad procuratores referre,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:12:54" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 12, 54</bibl></cit> et saep.: <cit><quote lang="la">(forum) exuviis nauticis et classium spoliis (i. e. rostris) ornatum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,009:18:55" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Cic.</author> Imp. Pomp. 18, 55</bibl></cit>; cf. <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1242,001:1:11:10" default="NO"><author>Flor.</author> 1, 11, 10</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">navalia,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=aug.:18" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Aug. 18 <hi rend="ital">fin.</hi></bibl></cit>: illud natura non patitur, ut aliorum spoliis nostras<cb n="SPON" />  facultates, copias, opes augeamus, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,055:3:5:22" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> Off. 3, 5, 22</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,002:3:8" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> Rosc. Am. 3, 8</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">spoliis civium exstructa domus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,005:15:52" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> A. 15, 52</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">(delatores) sacerdotia et consulatus et spolia adepti,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,004:1:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> H. 1, 2</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n45095.2" n="(b)" level="5"> <hi rend="ital">Sing.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">quo nunc Turnus ovat spolio,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0690,003:10:500" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Verg.</author> A. 10, 500</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Actoris Aurunci spolium,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>id.</author> ib. 12, 94</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">Asiam, spolium regis Antiochi, recepi,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0631,001:H. 4:61:11" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Sall.</author> H. 4, 61, 11</bibl></cit> Dietsch; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1348,001:life=jul.:64" default="NO"><author>Suet.</author> Caes. 64</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2806,001:19:3" default="NO"><author>Just.</author> 19, 3</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">fert secum spolium sceleris,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:8:87" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 8, 87</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">mendici spolium,</quote> <trans><tr>a beggar's rags</tr>,</trans> <bibl default="NO"><author>Petr.</author> 13, 1</bibl></cit>.—<usg type="style">Poet.</usg>, in gen., = arma, <hi rend="ital">arms</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:13:153" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 13, 153</bibl>.</sense></entryFree>
